questions: What is the main purpose of your visit to our country?
How long do you plan to stay and what places do you intend to visit?
Have you visited our country before? If yes, when and for what purpose?
What activities do you plan to engage in during your stay?
How do you plan to finance your trip?
Can you provide details about your current employment and income?
What is your estimated budget for this trip?
Do you have travel insurance coverage for your stay?
What is your current occupation in your home country?
What family or property ties do you have in your home country?
What ensures your return to your home country after the visit?
Can you describe your responsibilities back home?
Have you made your accommodation arrangements?
What is your planned itinerary?
Do you have confirmed return travel bookings?
Who will be accompanying you on this trip?
What do you know about our country's culture and customs?
Are you aware of any travel restrictions or requirements?
Do you have any local contacts or references in our country?
How have you prepared for potential language barriers?
